name: Pixel Lovin Squares
description:
This is my first NSFW game for the jam. I hope you enjoy it!

This is a short 2 minute game where the mechanic is centered around building

a small community of characters that live inside digital square toys.

Credits inside the folder, for now only windows since the mechanics are still experimental.

please comment if the font looks strange or something is broken, and if you enjoyed it and want me to make more a small donation would help me out a lot! I definitely plan on continuing this project with future updates :)
